title: Tie Guan Yin Oolong
description: Traditional Iron Goddess of Mercy oolong with orchid aroma and smooth finish.
longDescription: Tie Guan Yin, also known as Iron Goddess of Mercy, is a famous Chinese oolong tea from Anxi County in Fujian Province. The leaves are hand-picked and undergo a unique oxidation process that gives the tea its distinctive flavor. The infusion is golden yellow with a floral aroma reminiscent of orchids and a smooth, creamy texture. The flavor is complex, with notes of honey, fruit, and a hint of roasted nuts. Tie Guan Yin is known for its calming properties and is often enjoyed during meditation or relaxation.
brewingInstructions: Use water at 190°F (88°C). Steep for 3-5 minutes. Can be infused multiple times.

reviews.author: Oolong Lover
reviews.comment: This Tie Guan Yin is exquisite! The floral aroma and smooth finish are simply divine.

reviews.author: Tea Connoisseur
reviews.comment: A lovely oolong with a sweet, floral aroma. Perfect for a light afternoon brew.
